## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G28680](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G28680)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ANX2</u>
- **Gene Name:** ANXUR2
- **Description:**   Malectin/receptor-like protein kinase family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2148830
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [anx1-1 anx2-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Double mutant pollen tubes cease their growth and burst in vitro and fail to reach the female gametophytes in vivo.
